title: Sunny Pension
description: Sunny pension is a countryside house in a picturesque village Cortanovci, surrounded by trees and green, yet very close to the Railway and Bus station, 18 km from Novi sad. The nearest town to Cortanovci is Sremski Karlovci, well known for it's historical attractions. From Novi sad you will need half hour by train or by bus, and Belgrade is 50 km away. Perfect place to rest and try local food such as sauerkraut, wine and schnapps from their cellar. Organic veggies from their garden. Free Wi-Fi.
